analysis.description:
Airdrop.drop (/unique_contracts/0x678eb319ba870e76f0a7d75a2cad987e03e76545.sol#46-55) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(recipients[i],values[i]) (/unique_contracts/0x678eb319ba870e76f0a7d75a2cad987e03e76545.sol#49-53)

Testtoken5.multisend (/unique_contracts/0x678eb319ba870e76f0a7d75a2cad987e03e76545.sol#156-160) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(recipients[i],value * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_contracts/0x678eb319ba870e76f0a7d75a2cad987e03e76545.sol)

Airdrop.drop has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(recipients[i],values[i]) (/unique_contracts/0x678eb319ba870e76f0a7d75a2cad987e03e76545.sol#49-53)

Testtoken5.multisend has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(recipients[i],value * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_contracts/0x678eb319ba870e76f0a7d75a2cad987e03e76545.sol)
Testtoken5.version should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x678eb319ba870e76f0a7d75a2cad987e03e76545.sol#113-114)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x678eb319ba870e76f0a7d75a2cad987e03e76545.sol#152-156:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x678eb319ba870e76f0a7d75a2cad987e03e76545.sol#156:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
